b80.raw_citation: The synergistic potential of flow chemistry and biocatalysis is demonstrated. Process safety is greatly increased by in situ generation and biocatalytic conversion of hydrogen cyanide. The biocatalytic flow synthesis grants access to differently substituted chiral cyanohydrins
